author: gballet
content: the code hash is the Keccack of the code, so _not_ 32x0. Empty accounts have an assigned code size, according to the spec.

author: gballet
content: storage value are taken from the EVM and stored as is, so they are big endian because that's what the EVM does. Nonce, balance and code size are little endian.
